name: Robospierre (itch)
description:
Explore puzzles in the story of a robot and its bird!

Robospierre is a robot who needs to find a way for his bird through puzzles, embarking on a journey to unravel himself.

Controls:
Move using the arrows
Press R to restart the current level
Esc to go to the main menu
Attention: the game doesn't save your progress, 
so be careful when pressing Esc

Social Media:
Instagram: @contramaostudio
Twitter: contramaostudio

Songs:
Gambrel - Blue Dot Sessions
Paralytic Insomnia - David Hilowitz
